ModMetaData.name: No Water, No Life [1.0]
ModMetaData.author: himesama, schoos
ModMetaData.description:
for RimWorld 1.0 mod version 1.7.1
Description
This mod adds "Need Water" to pawns. There are various means to get and transport water, such as: wells, pumps, water pipes, faucets, water cleaners, and more. This mod should NOT be applied to saved games.
Direct download from github
https://github.com/schoos76/MizuMod/releases
Please click "Source code (zip)" of the version what you want. The downloaded zip file contains all the data as well as the source code.
